ds2830_requirements.form_name: Chapter 13 Debtor's Certifications Regarding Domestic Support Obligations and Section 522(q)
ds2830_requirements.mandatory_for: ALL Chapter 13 cases, whether or not debtor has ever owed alimony or child support
certification_options: Owed no domestic support obligation when filing and none required since
Have been required to pay domestic support and have paid all amounts due
ds2830_requirements.penalty_for_perjury: Information must be true and correct under penalty of perjury

consequences_warned.immediate: Case closure without discharge of debts
consequences_warned.vulnerability_created: Consumer left unprotected during reopening process
consequences_warned.creditor_opportunity: Window for coordinated attacks during administrative processing

attorney_warnings: Required of ALL Chapter 13 cases regardless of support obligations
Failure to file results in case closure WITHOUT discharge
Can only obtain discharge by re-opening case with additional fees
